systemGeneralClasses

Class SystemCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • systemGeneralClasses.Command
      • systemGeneralClasses.SystemCommand

  • public class SystemCommand
extends Command
    Class to represent commands of the system. All commands follow a similar format: oper_name op1 op2 ... There shall be one instance of this odt for each command that the system is able to process. For each command, it contains the operation name (or command name) and the type for each operand, if any.
    Author:
    Pedro I. Rivera-Vega
